name: Avoid PLC Copybook with more than XX lines of code (PL1)
description:
This rule searches for artifacts with more than X Lines of Code.
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
The report lists all the PLC Copybook having more than xx lines of code.

It provides following information: 
-  PLC Copybook full name
rationale: Artifacts with more than XX lines of code are generally difficult to maintain.
remediation: Split the PLC Copybooks in order to not have more than  XXX of code.
